channel.title: The Chat
channel.itunes:subtitle: Listen to four grown men in comfortable chairs spill their guts
channel.itunes:author: Matt Parkinson, Matt Quartermaine, Andrew Goodone, Tim Smith
channel.itunes:summary: Matt Parkinson, Matt Quartermaine, Andrew Goodone and Tim Smith recorded live every Friday.
channel.description: Once a week comedy show featuring Matt Parkinson, Matt Quartermaine, Andrew Goodone and Tim Smith
